subtitle: New thinking allowed

He is the author of several books, including

Nature in the Human Soul

Now, I'll switch over to the internet video.

Great. Yeah, it's the best place to start, because I do use the terms in ways that

what I ended up concluding is that part of

once I began to understand soul in the context

So, here's, it's a very simple definition.
The soul of a thing is its unique niche in its ecosystem.
That everything is born to take a particular place in its world, in its
more-than-human world, and it's in the Earth community into which it is born.
And
some people feel that when they hear my definition, that one, namely

when just about anybody uses the word soul,

being a
human on the Earth at this time. And if you

the way I use the word soul

So

or center on the interpretation of the dream.
